snippet.title: Official Teaser Trailer 2019 | Shadow Arena
snippet.description:
Watch the official teaser trailer for Shadow Arena, an all-new fantasy arena fighter game brought to you by the creators of the Black Desert franchise.
Register for the Closed Beta here: https://shadowarena.pearlabyss.com
The Shadow Arena Closed Beta will be available on PC and supported in both English and Korean.

Every fighter must fend for themselves and vie for victory as the darkness creeps in ever closer...
Countless will fall and only one will ultimately rise victorious on the fields of the Shadow Arena.

Stay tuned for G-STAR 2019 on November 14 to see the full trailer!
Get more details on Pearl Abyss at G-STAR here: https://gstar.pearlabyss.com

#ShadowArena #PearlAbyss #GSTAR


Visit Shadow Arena's official channels for more:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ShadowArenaGame
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/ShadowArena_
Website: https://shadowarena.pearlabyss.com
